summary: A fast test suite that validates the core functionality and performance optimizations of the image‑to‑video generation pipeline, covering attention slicing, callback handling, fused QKV projections, inference correctness, batch consistency, and VAE tiling using dummy components and inputs.
business_intent: Provide automated regression testing to guarantee that the image‑to‑video pipeline operates correctly and efficiently in production, enabling rapid detection of issues in key optimizations and ensuring reliable video generation from images.
